name: Summarize Processor
description: Summarizes a piece of text based on TF-IDF scores.

parameters.name: text_field
parameters.description: The field containing the text to summarize.

parameters.name: tfidf_field
parameters.description: The field containing the TF-IDF scores. Use the TF-IDF processor to compute.

parameters.name: num_lines
parameters.description: The number of lines the summarization text should contain.

parameters.name: return_plain_text
parameters.description: Whether or not to return a plain text or a list of all sentences of the summary.

parameters.name: optimal_sentence_length
parameters.description: The optimal length of sentence to include in the memory. The summarize processor will try to find sentence of length closest to this value.
